tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE vehicle_maintenance_schedule (
    vehicle_id INT,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
    maintenance_date DATE,
    technician_id INT,
    scheduled_by VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE service_schedules (
  schedule_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_id UUID,
  service_date DATE,
  service_type VARCHAR,
  mechanic_id UUID
)

CREATE TABLE Vehicle (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
make VARCHAR(255),
model VARCHAR(255),
year INT,
license_plate VARCHAR(15));

CREATE TABLE ServiceSchedule (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
vehicle_id INT REFERENCES Vehicle(id),
maintenance_type_id INT REFERENCES MaintenanceType(id),
schedule_date TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceLog (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
service_schedule_id INT REFERENCES ServiceSchedule(id),
notes TEXT,
completed BOOLEAN);

CREATE TABLE Vehicle (
    vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    make VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    model VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    year INT NOT NULL,
    license_plate VARCHAR(15) UNIQUE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceSchedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT NOT NULL,
    technician_id INT NOT NULL,
    scheduled_date DATE NOT NULL,
    service_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (vehicle_id) REFERENCES Vehicle(vehicle_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (technician_id) REFERENCES Technician(technician_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Technician (
    technician_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    specialization VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceLog (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    schedule_id INT NOT NULL,
    service_date DATE NOT NULL,
    service_cost DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    notes TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (schedule_id) REFERENCES MaintenanceSchedule(schedule_id)
);

CREATE TABLE PartsInventory (
    part_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    part_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    quantity_in_stock INT NOT NULL,
    unit_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);
